Subject: Re: Firedrill's  hope
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

"But the strategies are important to any battle, to keep the troops
together," Firdrill exclaims. He then thinks about Prowl's words about
needed warriors. He was not anxious to hear that. He didn't train for ten
years, just to learn how to aim a gun and take life, he trained to save it.
He followed on in silent, contemplating.
